In the messy room (G1) there's a disk sander belonging to Nic. He's kindly allowed us to use it.

If you're familiar with the use of disk sanders, you can consider yourself inducted. Please add your name to this page if you are willing to share your knowledge!

If you are not, please find somebody who is (the list on this page is a good place to start) to take you through a few basic safety rules, as it's very easy to remove your skin.

Inducted people

  • Nic
